CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 25, 1953, pg. 32, reads: "At Physical Education Conference - When the Conference of the American Association for Health, Physical Education and Recreation met at the William Penn Hotel here Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday of this week, these Negro delegates were in attendance. Front row: John H. Burr, Howard University; Mattie White, Baltimore public schools; Mrs. Florence Mitchell of Livingston College; Dr. William F. Burghardt, Morgan State College; and Miss Loretta White of the Baltimore YWCA. Back row: James T. Chambers, Howard University; Harry Bruce, Baltimore Public Schools; Evelyn Douglas, Baltimore public schools; and Leo C. Woods, Baltimore public schools. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group, front row, from left: John H. Burr, Mattie White, Florence Mitchell, Dr. William F. Burghardt, and Loretta White; back row: James T. Chambers, Harry Bruce, Evelyn Douglas, and Leo C. Woods, gathered for Conference of the American Association for Health, Physical Education and Recreation at William Penn Hotel
